Header: Be a Lady Officer & Earn Your Future!
Content: Sri Lanka Army welcomes applications from suitable patriotic and energetic female school leavers under 22 years of age for enlistment to the Army Regular Force as Lady Officer Cadets. If you are a lady, driven by an insatiable appetite for diverse challenges of different magnitude and possibilities of exploring your full potential and career success in life, You would be the ideal candidate to serve the Nation and earn its lifetime respect to You and the whole family. A rewarding salary, openings for overseas training, long facilities, health insurance, transport and accommodation await the qualified candidate. Applications close on 26 November 2018. For more information and applications, surf: www.army.lk/officers
